description:
Make Something Simple - Find Something Beautiful 

What if a picture had just one part? Two? Two thousand? Transform your photos through a tap-and-divide interface and create works of art. A “must tap to believe” app from the creators of iSupr8. No two people will create the same image from the same photo. 

Part™ analyzes your photo creating a single shape and accompanying color. With a tap your shape multiplies. Tap or swipe again. You chose when to stop the division, and what part of the image is most important. 

Now you can Print Your Creations Directly to Walgreens for pick up In about an hour (US only) . Use code: QPSAVE for 20% Off Part Prints from Walgreens. 

Features: 
- iPhone 5 support
- Pass Your Secret Reveals to Any Part(ner), Special Friend or the World. No registration required!
- Improved Photo and Music Album Mosaic Modes
- Rotate Exported Images
- Adjustable Background Color and Transparency
- Easy Access Video Instructions
- Simple & Powerful Interface 
- Create Works of Art From Any Photograph 
- Instantly Change from Smooth Dots to Strong Squares
- High Resolution Camera Roll Import & Export 
- Share to anyone via Facebook, Twitter & Email 
- Perfect Vector PDF Export for Infinitely Scalable Print Possibilities 
- Two finger swipe to undo/redo
- Export Color Palette Hex RGB Values Straight to Email or PDF 
- Powerful Photo Library Mosaic Mode
- Album art Mosaic Mode
- Secret roll the dice images
- In app purchases 
- Share to Muzy 

Hints: 
- You can undo any action with a two finger swipe to the left
- You can remove menu control icons by touch and hold action! 
- To restore purchases: Select "?", then select "Restore Purchases" on the lower right side of the screen. 
- Try black as a background color. It is great. 
- The more you share Part(ed) images the more Part will grow. 
- Photo Mosaic Mode is great. You should try it. 

Follow: 
Part™ on Twitter @madewithpart 

Enjoy: 
A Part™ gallery 
http://www.madewithpart.com 

Watch: 
Videos of Part™ and other MEA Mobile creations: http://www.youtube.com/user/MEAmobile/ 

MEA Mobile listens. If you have a 5 star comment or constructive criticism we'd love you here from you. Your input keeps us going.
releaseNotes:
• Live View: Turn the the world into a live mosaic! 
• Create a mosaic from your Album Covers!!
• Movable Buttons
• Updated for iOS7


Also Available from MEA Mobile:
